org.grouplens.lenskit.data.text

Interface EventTypeDefinition

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LikeBatchEventType, LikeEventType, RatingEventType

    public interface EventTypeDefinition
    Definition for an event type that can be used to load it from a file. Implementations of this class should register themselves with the Java ServiceLoader framework to be usable from the command line, data specification files, etc.
    Since:
    2.2

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Class<? extends EventBuilder> getBuilderType()
      Get the builder type used by this type definition.
      List<Field> getDefaultFields()
      Get the default field list for loading this event from text fields.
      String getName()
      A simple name for this event
      Set<Field> getRequiredFields()
      Get the set of required fields for this event type.
      EventBuilder newBuilder()
      Construct a new builder for this event type.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        A simple name for this event
        Returns:
        The name of this event type (used to refer to it from various UI entry points).

      • getBuilderType

        Class<? extends EventBuilder> getBuilderType()
        Get the builder type used by this type definition.

      • newBuilder

        EventBuilder newBuilder()
        Construct a new builder for this event type.
        Returns:
        The builder.

      • getRequiredFields

        Set<Field> getRequiredFields()
        Get the set of required fields for this event type.
        Returns:
        The fields without which events cannot be built.

      • getDefaultFields

        List<Field> getDefaultFields()
        Get the default field list for loading this event from text fields.
        Returns:
        The default field list for parsing events of this type.
